content: Single mother without a high school diploma. Lives in a rental apartment in a poor neighborhood as home purchase loan has been denied. Can only afford low quality food.
Below average literacy skills. Mother has no time to teach reading and doesnâ€™t have many books at home. Due to lack of insurance, missed a few necessary by the age vaccines.
Dropping out of school for low grades. Tries to find job to make some money. Early and unprotected sex. Stealing and first arrests.
Works at 2 part-time low paid jobs to make a living. No health insurance nor financial plan. No consistent relationships and eventually unexpected pregnancy and a child.
Mental health and general health challenges, still not having health insurance. Unable to care for his children
High debts, several arrests. Unemployed or underemployed. Small circle of friends/ support group
